reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, well-made, and appreciate its soft, wrinkle-free material. The dress can be dressed up or worn casually with accessories, and one customer notes it comes to just below the knee. They like the color options, with one mentioning the material doesn't bleed, and find the sizing accurate. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and Comfort
items.body: Beautiful, stylish, soft, rich color(deep green), easy to wear. I wore this to my husband’s funeral because I didn’t want to have to worry about how I looked on top of all the other feelings. It fits so well, true to size. Will buy an additional one! Read more
items.author: Patricia C. Allen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fav dress!!
items.body: True to size. Comfortable material. Has been washed multiple times and has not shrunk or faded. Looks good with flats and boots. Ended up ordering another one in a different color. I always get compliments on this dress. Read more
items.author: Lee Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfy dress. Ordered it in every color!
items.body: Love the comfort of this dress. It is flattering on and fits well even on a petite frame. The material is not too thick so it works perfect for fall and could even be worn with boots into early winter. TTS Read more
items.author: Sheri Paganie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fabric and fit good
items.body: Fit is good. Very nice dress. Nice material. Read more
items.author: Terry Viken

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Very nice dress, rich color, looks more expensive than the price Read more
items.author: Lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty dress!
items.body: I love this dress. The fabric is soft, not see through & the pattern is beautiful. It’s flattering. I prefer to wash on cold and hang to dry. It doesn’t wrinkle & is very comfortable. Read more
items.author: BABM

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy polyester
items.body: Cute dress but I didn’t care for the thin polyester material especially for fall/winter. Read more
items.author: Ingrid

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: I'm 5'1" and 120 lbs This dress fit perfectly Sleeves were way to long but, with elastic cuffs they are adjustable...very soft and the navy is very pretty Ordered 2 more Highly recommend . Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Red Pink, Deep Green, Blue, Deep Navy Blue, Floral Blue, Khaki Polka Dot, Hot Pink, Black, Multicolour Floral, Teal Blue, Coffee, Navy Blue, Brick Orange, Olive. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
